main event: On November 6, 1957, an electronics engineer observed a silvery-white disc-shaped object traveling at high speed in Great Neck, New York.
interesting points: The object was noiseless and exhibited no erratic motion during the observation,The sighting lasted for 1 minute and 20 seconds,The witness was a 43-year-old male who worked as an electronics engineer,There was no clear direction of travel or flight course evident for the object,The project's conclusions suggested that it was probably some type of aircraft.
